*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Rock}} }} ==Description== The '''Stone Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Stone Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Rock Gems]] {{Gem|Rock}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Stone Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Epic}} {{LootItem|Rusturf Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Meteor Falls|Epic}} {{LootItem|Jagged Pass|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Sealed Chamber|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt.
